definition: abbr. for 南亞區域合作聯盟|南亚区域合作联盟[Nan2 Ya4 Qu1 yu4 He2 zuo4 Lian2 meng2]
south
surname Nan
oath/pledge/union/to ally/league, a subdivision corresponding to prefecture in Inner Mongolia

sentences.english: Cooperation between China and SAARC thus faces a historical opportunity. China is South Asia's biggest neighbor.
sentences.chinese: 中國與南盟合作面臨着歷史性機遇。

sentences.english: Saivamsikrishna Pasupuleti (Unknown)I don't think china, should come into SAARC.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲中國不應該進入南盟。

sentences.english: The Bangladesh side expressed support for Chinese efforts to enhance cooperation with the SAARC community.
sentences.chinese: 孟方支持中國與南盟加強合作的努力。

sentences.english: China attaches great importance to developing friendly relations of cooperation with SAARC.
sentences.chinese: 中國重視發展與南盟的友好合作關係。

sentences.english: Since China is an observer of SAARC, which Chinese official will be sent to the Summit?
sentences.chinese: 中國是南盟觀察員，此次將派誰率團出席？

sentences.english: Bangladesh welcomes China to become an observer country of the South Asian Association for Regional Cooperation (SAARC).
sentences.chinese: 孟加拉國歡迎中國成爲南盟觀察員。

sentences.english: attaches great importance to developing friendly relations of cooperation with SAARC.
sentences.chinese: 中國重視發展與南盟的友好合作關係。

sentences.english: Will China plan to play a role in SAARC?
sentences.chinese: 中國是否打算在南盟中發揮作用？

sentences.english: I am delighted to be here to attend the 16th SAARC Summit in this beautiful city of Thimphu.
sentences.chinese: 很高興來到美麗之廷布，出席第十六屆南盟峯會。
